meanings: 의견 말하기 I'm happy to accept your offer.
whether someone does something or not

vlive.korean: 왜 그러는 거야! What's wrong with you? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤

왜 그러는 거야! - 아따 귀엽네! Why is he like that? - So cute! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤

vlive.korean: 왜 자꾸 1,000원, 100원 왜 그러는 거예요? Why do the fans keep writing 1000 won and 100 won? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
